article.Heading: Shortage of drugs? Ground report from Mumbai's markets
article.Summary: Is there a shortage of drugs in the country as a fallout of GST? There have been mixed reports on the availability of key lifesaving drugs. CNBC-TV18's Archana Shukla stepped out to do a check on the ground situation.
article.Body:
Is there a shortage of drugs in the country as a fallout of GST? There have been mixed reports on the availability of key lifesaving drugs. CNBC-TV18's Archana Shukla stepped out to do a check on the ground situation.
